abstract: Google Friend Connect lets small Web sites offer social networking features by tapping into the existing systems run by AOL, Yahoo, Google, Facebook, LinkedIn and others.
snippet: Google Friend Connect lets small Web sites offer social networking features by tapping into the existing systems run by AOL, Yahoo, Google, Facebook, LinkedIn and others.
lead_paragraph: If you run a Web site, you may have a lot of new friends.

headline.main: Google Wants to Help Web Sites Make New Friends
